channel.title: Anthony Anderson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Anthony Anderson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Anthony Anderson “Regrets” If 2003 Lindsay Lohan Interview “Intended as Comedy” Was in “Poor Taste”
item.description: The comedian, who was speaking with the then-17-year-old ‘Freaky Friday’ star, made comments in a resurfaced clip from ‘The Sharon Osbourne Show’ that social media users are now criticizing.
